title: Send an Engagement Letter to a New Client
description: After a new client agrees to retain the firm, a paralegal needs to send them the official engagement letter for signature.

tasks.description: Select the firm's standard engagement letter template.
Populate the template with the client's name, the scope of the representation, and the agreed-upon fee structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent customizes the letter for the specific client and matter.

tasks.description: Send the engagement letter to the client for their review and signature via an e-signature platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives the letter and can sign it electronically.
